import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {ToastContainer} from 'react-toastify' import Login from './Login' function Signup() { const [loginInfo,setLoginInfo] = useState({ name: '', email: '', password: '' }) const handleChange = (e) => { const {name,value} = e.target; console.log(name,value); const copyLoginInfo = {...loginInfo}; copyLoginInfo[name] = value; setLoginInfo(copyLoginInfo); } console.log('LoginInfo -> ',loginInfo) return (
